data.title: World Population by Country (2013)
data.meta_description: Population of the world by country with area, population density, yearly population change rate, projected population by 2050, percentage of global population for each country. Data as of July 1, 2013, sourced from the United Nations
data.text:
See updated list: World Population by Country (2014)

Source: World Population Prospect: the 2012 Revision - United Nations Population Division of the Department of Economic and Social Affairs, United Nations, June 13, 2013
